nodes.text: Bodis-Ker Vitan was a Jedi Knight and the Jedi Watchman of the planet Cadinth in the Mid Rim. Cadinth supported the Galactic Republic against a militant secessionist faction during the Separatist Crisis, but in 22 BBY a pro-Separatist uprising broke out in the planet's capital city of Saskapeg, leading to Vitan's death. The Cadinth Oligarchy subsequently withdrew its previous support of the Republic, with Prime Oligarch Rankwin Fopow later revoking those statements and declaring that the planet was "firmly undecided" between the two groups.

Bodis-Ker Vitan was mentioned in an issue of the HoloNet News feed (2002), Volume 531, Issue 55, that was published in-universe on the ninth day of the third month in 22 BBY. The article that references Vitan, entitled "Cadinth Loyalty Uncertain After Jedi Death," was written by Pablo Hidalgo and Paul Ens.
